title: Andriod & IOS Professional
jobDescription:
Solventek Private Limited  is looking for Andriod & IOS Professional  to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey.1. Application Development:

Design and develop mobile applications for Android or iOS platforms using programming languages such as Java, Kotlin, Swift, or Objective-C.
Create user interfaces and user experiences (UI/UX) that are intuitive and visually appealing.
2. Programming:

Write, debug, and maintain high-quality, clean, and efficient code.
Ensure the application's performance, security, and responsiveness.
3. Cross-Platform Development:

Develop apps that are compatible with multiple devices and screen sizes.
Utilize cross-platform development frameworks like React Native or Flutter to streamline development for both Android and iOS.
4. Testing and Debugging:

Perform rigorous testing, including unit testing, integration testing, and user acceptance testing.
Debug and troubleshoot issues, ensuring a bug-free application.
5. Version Control:

Use version control systems (e.g., Git) to manage and track changes to the codebase.
6. Integration of APIs:

Integrate with external APIs and web services to access data and functionalities.
Implement features like social media sharing, push notifications, and location services.
7. Performance Optimization:

Optimize app performance, including speed, responsiveness, and memory usage.
Address performance bottlenecks and ensure smooth user experiences.
8. UI/UX Design:

Collaborate with UI/UX designers to implement user-friendly interfaces and responsive designs.
Ensure consistent branding and a visually pleasing app.

title: Senior Android Engineer

ambitionBoxData.Title: Greenlight Financial Technology Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
We are looking for a highly motivated Senior Mobile Engineer, Android with experience in building apps with high importance to UX experience, performance and quality. Someone who loves to work together as a team to build solutions/capabilities that can be reused across multiple teams and domains. Also enjoy learning and growing each day. The ideal candidate has working experience in Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, Jetpack Navigation. Understands the Android SDKs and frameworks to a great extent.
 
Technologies we use:
  • Frontend: Kotlin+Compose for Android, Swift+SwiftUI for iOS
  • Backend: Node.js Kotlin
  • REST, graphQL
  • MySQL, DynamoDB

What you will be doing:
  • Redesigning a lot of the client experiences on the consumer app in a new and refreshed way using Kotlin and Compose
  • Build new product features for Greenlight families with great user experience
  • Continuously evaluate and improve your code quality and performance.
  • Write your own Unit and Functional tests
  • Work closely with the backend team while building out client server apis (REST and graphQL)
  • Improve engineering tooling, process, and standards to enable faster, more consistent, more reliable releases
  • Focus on Modularization, Reliability and Reusability

What you will bring:
  • Bachelor degree in Computer Science or equivalent work experience
  • Bachelors Degree in Computer Science or equivalent
  • 3+ years of experience in Kotlin is a MUST
  • 5+ years of solid Android experience
  • Experience building UI with Jetpack Compose is a plus
  • Experience building quality apps
  • A passion for building reusable solutions
  • A collaborative, positive, inclusive and team-oriented attitude
  • A desire to learn and master new technologies
